events.body: Can you sign this key with your old key or something similar to prove its yours? I tried retrieving the key from the keysevers and I looked to see if the git commit was PGP signed. (Sorry if my neck beard is showing through)
@PRabahy GnuPG refuses to sign with a revoked key. I'll try.

ACK

On Wednesday, October 28, 2015, Paul Rabahy notifications@github.com
wrote:

> ACK 4252cd0
